spiritsExplanation:
The workout 'Afterglow Cool-Down' is primarily a Soothing & Restorative session, as indicated by the title "Cool-Down" and the phrase "let your worries fade away." The focus on reflection and steady rowing suggests a gentle, recovery-focused approach, warranting a high score (0.9) for this spirit. 

The Flow & Rhythm spirit is also present, albeit to a lesser degree (score: 0.6), due to the "steady" format and the role of music in creating a harmonious and calming experience. The inclusion of indie and global hits enhances the rhythmical element, promoting a connected flow.

The Outdoor & Adventure spirit is evident from the image depicting rowing on a river, suggesting an outdoor setting. This aligns well with the adventurous aspect of experiencing nature, providing a strong match (score: 0.8) for this spirit, emphasizing exploration in a calming natural environment. 

High-Energy & Intense, Structured & Disciplined, and Sport & Agility are excluded due to the workout’s explicit focus on cooling down and relaxation.
